name: Blade Prince Academy
storyline: Play as the Blade Princes, the promising students of the Academy, trained to protect the city of Abjectalia from all kinds of threats: drug-dealing gangs, mad cultists of death... Many trials awaits the Blade Princes and sometimes, the danger hits closer to home.
summary: Blade Prince Academy is a modern take on the tactical RPG genre! It features an anime-inspired art style with dynamic and deep tactical real-time combat with emphasis on timing and combos. Experience the unique city of Abjectalia while becoming a true master of enhanced real-time-with-pause gameplay
